title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-cli-info
author: oeyoews
name: neotw-cli-info
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-cli-info/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-cli-info/readme","description":"neotw-cli-info"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-cli/startup.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-cli/startup.js","text":"/*\
title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-cli/startup.js
type: application/javascript
module-type: startup

\*/
exports.name="cli-info-startup-hook",exports.platforms=["node"],exports.after=["startup"],exports.synchronous=!0,exports.startup=()=>{const n=n=>$tw.wiki.filterTiddlers(n).length,t=n("[plugin-type[plugin]]"),i=n("[plugin-type[plugin]author[oeyoews]]"),o=n("[plugin-type[plugin]prefix[$:/plugins/tiddlywiki]] [[$:/core]]"),p=t-o-i;$tw.utils.log(`\n@neotw-cli-info plugin\n🐠 太微版本 -> ${$tw.version}\n📦 全部插件 -> ${t}\n👮 官方插件 -> ${o}\n🔪 用户插件 -> ${i}\n🧩 其他插件 -> ${p}\n\n`,"cyan")};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"startup"}}}
